subtitle: This delicious mousse like pudding makes a light and refreshing dessert.

method.text: Put the coffee in a heatproof bowl. Add the yolks and sugar. Stand the bowl over a pan of hot, but not boiling, water. Stir or whisk for 3-5 min, until mixture is sufficiently thick to coat the back of a wooden spoon.

Pour the whiskey into a small heatproof bowl. Sprinkle over the gelatine. Leave until absorbed. Stand the bowl over a pan of hot water for 2-3 min until gelatine has dissolved. Add the warm coffee mixture, blending thoroughly. Allow to cool and stiffen slightly.

Meanwhile, whip the cream in a bowl until it just holds its shape. Whisk the egg whites in a separate bowl until very stiff but not dry. Carefully fold the cream and then the egg whites into the jellied mixture.
Spoon into a large serving dish, or individual sundae glasses. Allow to set in the fridge. Serve well chilled.

title: Irish coffee pudding
